title: T206 Hooks Wiltse Looks Minty! SOLD
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: T206 Hooks Wiltse Looks Minty! SOLD
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell an extra from a lot I bought recently (thanks Tony). Card is graded technically a SGC 30 Good 2 but front looks SO much better w no creases that I can see and great l/r centering. Back does have some staining which is the likely reason for the lower grade---will send back scan if there is interest. $SOLD dlvd. PM if interested.

[IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/Wiltse.jpg[/IMG]
